about.title: About us
about.description1: We offer a fast, safe and easy-to-use platform where you can find bus tickets at the best prices.
about.description2: We work with trusted operators, constantly update schedules and provide real support when you need it.
about.description3: With us, your journey begins stress-free in just a few clicks!
about.features_title: Plan your trips easier, faster and more conveniently!

feature1.title: Best price guarantee
feature1.description: We constantly check partner rates to offer you the best bus ticket prices.

feature2.title: Fast and simple booking
feature2.description: Our platform is intuitive, works on any device and lets you easily choose your preferred route.

feature3.title: Real support when you need it
feature3.description: Whether you have a question or made a mistake in a booking, our support team responds promptly!

booking.buy_ticket_slogan: Buy a bus ticket online easily!
booking.additional_info: Regular trips, comfortable minibuses, and flexible schedules!

planning.title: Plan your perfect trip!
planning.subtitle: Search and buy tickets for the most popular routes

reservation.title: Reserve a seat!
reservation.subtitle: The most popular route right now

subscription.title: Stay updated on new routes, discounts, and special offers. Subscribe to ARIC news and plan your trips easier, faster, and more conveniently.

customer_feedback.title: What do customers say about our trips?

discount_offer.title: Discount!
discount_offer.description: Buy a round-trip ticket and get a discount on the second one!

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of terms
section1.text: By accessing and using this site, you agree to the terms presented here.

section2.title: 2. Services
section2.text: We provide a platform where users can compare offers for transport services.

section3.title: 3. User obligations
section3.text: Users must provide correct information and not use the platform for illegal purposes.

section4.title: 4. Liability
section4.text: We are not liable for losses resulting from the use or inability to use our services.

section5.title: 5. Changes
section5.text: We may modify these terms at any time. Updates will appear on this page.

section1.title: 1. Data collection
section1.text: We collect personal information submitted through forms, such as name and email.

section2.title: 2. Data use
section2.text: The data is used to contact you, send offers and improve our services.

section3.title: 3. Data security
section3.text: We implement measures to protect personal data from unauthorized access.

section4.title: 4. User rights
section4.text: You can request to access or delete your personal data at any time.

section5.title: 5. Cookies
section5.text: We use cookies to enhance your experience. Continuing navigation implies acceptance.

section6.title: 6. Changes
section6.text: We may update this policy from time to time. Changes will be posted here.

contacts.title: Contact us.
contacts.subtitle: We are here to help you!

footer.title: Book your seat easily and enjoy a safe and comfortable journey. Modern minibuses, flexible schedules, and fast online booking – everything you need for a smooth trip.
footer.address: Republic of Moldova, mun. Chișinău, Calea Basarabiei 26

email_subscription.title: Receive discount notifications!
email_subscription.description: Plan your trips easier, faster, and more conveniently.

auth.email_prompt: Please enter the email address where we will send your tickets.
auth.phone_prompt: We will send a one-time password to your mobile number
auth.input_otp_phone: Enter the OTP code sent to

passengers.label: Number of passengers
passengers.adult: {count, plural, one {# adult} few {# adults} many {# adults} other {# adults}}
passengers.child: {count, plural, one {# child} few {# children} many {# children} other {# children}}
passengers.max_seats_reached: The limit of {count} available seats has been reached

consentText: I agree to the <terms></terms> in accordance with the <privacyPolicy></privacyPolicy>
$Nu a fost găsit nici un bilet pentru ac: No tickets were found for this route!
$Doriți să anulați biletul?: Do you want to cancel the ticket?
$În funcție de timpul rămas până la plec: Depending on the time remaining before departure, a retention fee is charged on the ticket – an amount withheld from the passenger when returning the ticket.
$Vă rugăm să verificați datele introduse: Please check the entered data or try again. If the problem persists, contact us for assistance.
$Doriți să anulați biletele?: Do you want to cancel the tickets?

cookies.message: This website uses cookies to enhance your experience.
